venue.address_2: (adjacent to the Long Wharf Marriott and across from the New England Aquarium )
venue.name: Rock And Blues Cruises

item.description:
Drinks, music, people... ON A BOAT!

Not going to the Paolo Nutini concert? Haven't seen Boston's breathtaking skyline from the water? Now's the time! Come rock the harbor with your fellow music lovers!

About the Rock and Blues Concert Cruises
Cruises depart from the Boston Harbor Cruise gates at Long Wharf, adjacent to the Long Wharf Marriott and across from the New England Aquarium on Atlantic Avenue. Boats board 1/2 hour before the time listed on website. Cruises generally last three hours and are general admission. There is a cash bar on board. Ticket holders must be 21+.

Pre-Party
Join us at The Landing on Long Wharf Before the Cruise for the Bon Voyage Pre-Party!
Before setting sail, join your fellow Rock and Blues Cruise mates at The Landing for a Bon Voyage Pre-Party beginning 2 hours before departure. The Landing is conveniently located at Long Warf just a few feet away from your ship. Be sure to check out your boarding times as you won't want to miss the boat.

Sample the music
Local guys from Bridgeport CT: Alternate Routes
All the way from Cape Town South Africa: Civil Twilight

Meetup Info
  • Only Yes RSVP's will get my cell number by 5 pm the day of
  • Pre-party on the wharf starts at 6 pm at The Landing (NOTE THAT WE MEET AT 7)
  • Boards at 7:30 with an 8 pm departure from Long Wharf (near Marriott Hotel and New England Aquarium)
  • Cash bar on the wharf and on the boat
  • Boat returns at 11 pm


Buy Your Tickets
Tickets are $25 plus ticket fee = $29.36. (Be sure to pick the correct date!)
Rock And Blues Cruise

Come enjoy a night of music, friends and great views!
item.how_to_find_us: See my picture. Yes RSVP's will get my cell phone number by 5 pm the day of
item.name: Rock The Harbor Music Cruise
